abstract.para: The intended readers of this document are developers using eXo Platform. This document provides developers, and beginners with the comprehensive knowledge of eXo JCR - a powerful open source implementation of the Java Specification Request 170 also known as the Content Repository for Java technology API.

It is expected you will be able to use your gained knowledge here either for portlet development or as the first step to bundle eXo Portlet Container with your own Portal implementation to reach compliance with JSR 168 and JSR 286.
The guide is divided into the following chapters:

listitem.para: Basic knowledge of JCR, the JCR architecture and its compatibility levels.
Instructions on how to configure and use JCR from basic to advanced configuration.
The references which are useful for developers, including JCR node type, namespace, search, services and extensions.
Instructions on how to configure JCR connectors, database, administration tools and performance tuning.
